projects.title: Codemagic
projects.description: Codemagic.gr is a powerful online code editor for web development! It's open-source and it follows the philosophy of client-side and fast execution. It's built for creative people who do a lot of web-related experiments and want to test stuff in real-time without the hassle of preparing project files and whatnot. It is also a great place for people to come and learn various web-technologies like HTML, CSS, JS and their derivatives.

projects.title: veRepo
projects.description: veRepo is an open source SASS library of modules and mixins for robust and maintainable Frontend development using SASS. Most of the modular items/objects in this repo will work by just adding 1 class name to the html element you desire to style (although there are some exceptions).

projects.title: Sass.js Playground
projects.description: A digital playground to explore the capabilities of Sass.js.

projects.title: docFinder
projects.description: An open source Documentation Searching webapp using searchco.de's API which provides documentation for languages like Apache 2, GIT, GNU/Linux Commands, HTTP Codes, Java, Javascript, JQuery, MySQL, Nginx, Perl 5, PHP, Python, Underscore.js, VB 6 and more.
